rdfs:Property.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Property.dct:description: Specifies restriction on the storage of personal data

rdfs:Class.dct:description: Regularity and temporal span of data restoration/backup mechanisms that guarantee that data is preserved

rdfs:Class.dct:description: Practices and policies regarding training of staff members
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:Class.dct:description: Encryption of data in transit e.g. when being transferred from one location to another, including sharing
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:Class.dct:description: Non-disclosure Agreements e.g. preserving confidentiality of information
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: certification mechanisms, seals, and marks for the purpose of demonstrating compliance

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Specifies policy regarding repetition or renewal of existing certification(s)

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: A set of rules or procedures outlining the norms and practices for conducting activities
methods which restrict access to a place or resource
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:Class.dct:description: protocols involving validation of identity i.e. authentication of a person or information
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Specifies procedures for determining permission or authority

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: process by which personal data is irreversibly altered in such a way that a data subject can no longer be identified directly or indirectly, either by the data controller alone or in collaboration with any other party

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: A set of rules or guidelines outlining criterias for design
a seal or a mark indicating proof of certification to some certification or standard
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Process by identifiable personal data (PII) is converted to un-identifiable personal data

rdfs:Property.dct:description: Specifies location for storage of personal data
rdfs:Property.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Encryption of data when being stored (persistent encryption)

owl:Ontology.dct:description: The Data Privacy Vocabulary provides terms (classes and properties) to annotate and categorize instances of legally compliant personal data handling. These terms are intended to annotate Legal Personal Data Handling in a machine-readable fashion, by specifying which personal data categories are undergoing a specific kind of processing, by a specific data controller and/or shared with some recipient for a particular purpose , based on a specific legal ground (e.g. consent or legitimate interest), with specific technical and organisational measures and restrictions (e.g. storage location and storage duration) in place.
owl:Ontology.dct:title: Data Privacy Vocabulary
owl:Ontology.dct:creator: Axel Polleres
Harshvardhan J. Pandit
owl:Ontology.dct:abstract: The Data Privacy Vocabulary provides terms (classes and properties) to annotate and categorize instances of legally compliant personal data handling according to the EU General Data Protection Regulation. This scope could be extended by later versions to other data and privacy protection regulations. The vocabulary provides terms to describe which personal data Categories are undergoing a specified kind of processing by a specific data controller and/or transferred to some recipient for a particular purpose , based on a specific legal ground (e.g. consent, or other legal grounds such as legitimate interest, etc.), with specified technical and organisational measures and restrictions (e.g. storage locations and storage durations) in place.

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Contractual terms governing data handling within the data controller
Defines how secure deletion is guaranteed
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Practices regarding selecting appropriate data protection and privacy measures as the 'default' in an activity or service

rdfs:Property.dct:description: Specifies duration for storage of personal data
rdfs:Property.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:Class.dct:description: Practices regarding incorporating data protection and privacy in the design of information and services
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:Property.dct:creator: Axel Polleres
rdfs:Property.dct:description: a generic ObjectProperty to describe how the measure is implemented. For the values of this property we either allow a blank node with a single rdfs:comment to describe the measure, or a URI to a standard or best practice followed, i.e. a well-known identifier for that standard or a URL where the respective document describes the standard.

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Category of certifications, seals, and marks indicating compliance to regulations or practices

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: PseudoAnonmyization or 'pseudonymisation’ means the processing of personal data in such a manner that the personal data can no longer be attributed to a specific data subject without the use of additional information, provided that such additional information is kept separately and is subject to technical and organisational measures to ensure that the personal data are not attributed to an identified or identifiable natural person;
A duration or temporal entity denoting limitation on storage of personal data
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Restrictions required or followed regarding storage of data

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Data Protection Impact Assessments as per GDPR art 35, other Privacy Impact Assessments, threat severity assessment https://www.cnil.fr/en/privacy-impact-assessment-pia
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Risk management refers to a coordinated set of activities and methods that is used to direct an organization and to control the many risks that can affect its ability to achieve objectives. The term risk management also refers to the programme that is used to manage risk. This programme includes risk management principles, a risk management framework, and a risk management process.
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:Class.dct:description: Technical measures required/followed when processing data of the declared category
rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Category of technical measures consisting of pseudoanonymization and encryption

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Organisational measures required/followed when processing data of the declared category

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Defines a location or goespatial scope, where the data is (physically) stored

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: Guidelines or Principles regarding processing and operational measures

rdfs:Class.dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
rdfs:Class.dct:description: A legally binding agreement
